alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Fayette, northeastern Coweta, south central Fulton and west central Clayton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Union City, or 8 miles southeast of City of South Fulton, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... City of South Fulton, Peachtree City, Union City, Fairburn, Tyrone, Palmetto, Cannongate and Sandy Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
